bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SERVER FOR MANAGING ADVERTISEMENTS

abstract.p: A method and server for managing advertisements are provided. The method and server attract a searcher's attention by a contest among a plurality of items extracted in relation to a search word, give a predetermined benefit according to contest ranks, and provide an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the benefit to the searcher, thereby maximizing advertising effects. The method includes receiving, at a receiver of an advertisement managing server, a search word input by a searcher, providing, at a contest space provider of the advertisement managing server, a contest space to the searcher to hold a contest among a plurality of items related to the search word and including link information, determining, at a contest rank determiner of the advertisement managing server, contest ranks of the items in consideration of the number of links, providing, at a benefit provider of the advertisement managing server, a benefit corresponding to the determined contest ranks, and providing, at an advertisement provider of the advertisement managing server, an advertisement of an advertiser supporting provision of the benefit to the searcher.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method for managing advertisement and advertisement management server

abstract.p: The present invention relates to a method for managing an advertisement and an advertisement management server, in which an advertising effect can be magnified by: arousing a searcher's interest through the composition of confrontation among a plurality of items extracted in association with a search word
adding predetermined benefits in accordance with the ranking of confrontation

and providing to a searcher an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the predetermined benefits. In relation to one embodiment of the present invention, the method for managing the advertisement comprises the steps of: allowing a receiving unit of an advertisement management server to receive an input of a predetermined search word from a searcher

allowing a confrontation space providing unit of said advertisement management server to provide a confrontation space to the searcher, such that a confrontation is made among a plurality of items which are associated with the predetermined search word and include link information therein

allowing a confrontation ranking determination unit of said advertisement management server to determine the ranking of confrontation for the plurality of items in consideration of the number of links
allowing a benefit providing unit of said advertisement management server to provide benefits according to the determined ranking of confrontation
and allowing an advertisement providing unit of said advertisement management server to provide to said searcher an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the provision of said benefits.

abstract.p: A method and server for managing advertisements are provided. The method and server attract a searcher's attention by a contest among a plurality of items extracted in relation to a search word, give a predetermined benefit according to contest ranks, and provide an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the benefit to the searcher, thereby maximizing advertising effects.

The method includes receiving, at a receiver of an advertisement managing server, a search word input by a searcher, providing, at a contest space provider of the advertisement managing server, a contest space to the searcher to hold a contest among a plurality of items related to the search word and including link information, determining, at a contest rank determiner of the advertisement managing server, contest ranks of the items in consideration of the number of links, providing, at a benefit provider of the advertisement managing server, a benefit corresponding to the determined contest ranks, and providing, at an advertisement provider of the advertisement managing server, an advertisement of an advertiser supporting provision of the benefit to the searcher.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SERVER FOR MANAGING ADVERTISEMENT

nplcit.text: JPN6012042739; 渡辺 隆広: 'オーバーチュア スポンサードサーチVSグーグル アドワーズ' iNTERNET magazine 2nd STAGE No.108, 20040101, pp.106-113, 株式会社インプレス
- CSND200401289004; 渡辺 隆広: 'オーバーチュア スポンサードサーチVSグーグル アドワーズ' iNTERNET magazine 2nd STAGE No.108, 20040101, pp.106-113, 株式会社インプレス

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method and server for managing advertisements, which attracts a searcher's attention by a contest among a plurality of items extracted in relation to a search word, gives a predetermined benefit according to contest ranks, and provides an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the predetermined benefit to the searcher, thereby maximizing advertising effects.
SOLUTION: A method includes: receiving, at a receiver of an advertisement managing server, a prescribed search word input by a searcher

providing, at a contest space provider of the advertisement managing server, a contest space to the searcher so as to hold a contest among a plurality of items related to the prescribed search word and including link information
determining, at a contest rank determiner of the advertisement managing server, contest ranks of the items for the plurality of items in consideration of the number of links
providing, at a benefit provider of the advertisement managing server, a benefit corresponding to the determined contest ranks
and providing, at an advertisement provider of the advertisement managing server, an advertisement of an advertiser supporting provision of the benefit to the searcher.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2013,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR MANAGING ADVERTISEMENT AND ADVERTISEMENT MANAGEMENT SERVER

nplcit.text: JPN6012042739; 渡辺 隆広: 'オーバーチュア スポンサードサーチVSグーグル アドワーズ' iNTERNET magazine 2nd STAGE No.108, 20040101, pp.106-113, 株式会社インプレス

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method for managing an advertisement and an advertisement management server, in which an advertising effect can be maximized by: attracting a searcher's interest through a confrontation structure among a plurality of items extracted in association with a search word
adding predetermined benefits in accordance with the ranking of confrontation
and providing a searcher with an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the predetermined benefits.

SOLUTION: A method for managing an advertisement comprises the steps of: allowing a receiving unit of an advertisement management server to receive an input of a predetermined search word from a searcher

allowing a confrontation space providing unit of the advertisement management server to provide a confrontation space to the searcher, such that a confrontation is made among a plurality of items which are associated with the predetermined search word and include link information therein
allowing a confrontation ranking determination unit of the advertisement management server to determine the ranking of confrontation for the plurality of items in consideration of the number of links
allowing a benefit providing unit of the advertisement management server to provide benefits according to the determined ranking of confrontation
and allowing an advertisement providing unit of the advertisement management server to provide the searcher with an advertisement of an advertiser supporting provision of the benefits.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2013,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SERVER OF MANAGING ADVERTISEMENT

abstract.p: PURPOSE: An advertisement method and an advertisement managing server are provided to enable a searcher to have good impression about the advertiser by providing advertisement of advertiser which supports the benefit to the searcher. CONSTITUTION: A predetermined search word input is received from a searcher(S310). During predetermined time, a confrontation space is provided to the searcher(S320). The plurality of advertisement items is displayed on a confrontation space for confrontation at the same time. The advertisement items is rolled in the confrontation space, the rolled advertisement items is randomly displayed. The confrontation rank about the advertisement items is determined(S330). As confrontation time passes, confrontation rank information about the advertisement items is provided to the searcher.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SERVER OF MANAGING ADVERTISEMENT

abstract.p: PURPOSE: An advertisement method and an advertisement managing server are provided to cause interest of a searcher and add predetermined benefits according to confrontation rank through a contest composition between items extracted by interconnected with a search word. CONSTITUTION: A receiving unit(210) receives a predetermined search word input from a searcher. A contest space provider(220) provides the contest space to a searcher during predetermined time to comprised confrontation between advertisement items. A contest ranking determining unit(230) determines a contest rank about the advertisement items. A benefit providing unit(240) provides the benefit to correspond to the rank which benefit is determined. An advertisement providing unit(250) provides an advertisement of advertiser who supports the benefit providing to the searcher.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR MANAGING ADVERTISEMENT AND ADVERTISEMENT MANAGEMENT SERVER
PROCÉDÉ DE GESTION D'UNE PUBLICITÉ ET SERVEUR DE GESTION DE PUBLICITÉ

abstract.p: The present invention relates to a method for managing an advertisement and an advertisement management server, in which an advertising effect can be magnified by: arousing a searcher's interest through the composition of confrontation among a plurality of items extracted in association with a search word
adding predetermined benefits in accordance with the ranking of confrontation

and providing to a searcher an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the predetermined benefits. In relation to one embodiment of the present invention, the method for managing the advertisement comprises the steps of: allowing a receiving unit of an advertisement management server to receive an input of a predetermined search word from a searcher

allowing a confrontation space providing unit of said advertisement management server to provide a confrontation space to the searcher, such that a confrontation is made among a plurality of items which are associated with the predetermined search word and include link information therein

allowing a confrontation ranking determination unit of said advertisement management server to determine the ranking of confrontation for the plurality of items in consideration of the number of links
allowing a benefit providing unit of said advertisement management server to provide benefits according to the determined ranking of confrontation
and allowing an advertisement providing unit of said advertisement management server to provide to said searcher an advertisement of an advertiser supporting the provision of said benefits.

La présente invention concerne un procédé de gestion d'une publicité et un serveur de gestion de publicité, caractérisés en ce qu'un impact publicitaire peut être amplifié en : éveillant l'intérêt d'un prospecteur par la composition d'une confrontation entre une pluralité d'éléments extraits en association avec un terme de recherche
en ajoutant des gratifications prédéterminées en fonction du classement de confrontation
et en présentant à un prospecteur une publicité d'un annonceur soutenant les gratifications prédéterminées.

En relation avec un mode de réalisation de la présente invention, le procédé de gestion de la publicité comporte les étapes consistant à : permettre à une unité réceptrice d'un serveur de gestion de publicité de recevoir la saisie d'un terme de recherche prédéterminé de la part d'un prospecteur

permettre à une unité d'aménagement d'espace de confrontation dudit serveur de gestion de publicité de présenter un espace de confrontation au prospecteur, de telle façon qu'une confrontation soit mise en place entre une pluralité d'éléments qui sont associés au terme de recherche prédéterminé et contiennent des informations de liens

permettre à une unité de détermination du classement de confrontation dudit serveur de gestion de publicité de déterminer le classement de confrontation pour la pluralité d'éléments, compte tenu du nombre de liens
permettre à une unité d'attribution de gratifications dudit serveur de gestion de publicité d'attribuer des gratifications en fonction du classement déterminé de confrontation

et permettre à une unité de présentation de publicités dudit serveur de gestion de publicité de présenter audit prospecteur une publicité d'un annonceur soutenant l'attribution desdites gratifications.
